title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8201-3.1 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20 §§ 8201-3.1 - Applicability

State Regulations

The provisions of this Subpart shall pertain to applicants
for State assistance for purposes of assessment rolls with taxable status dates
occurring on or after March 1, 2010, pursuant to section
1573 (1) and (2)
of the

Real Property Tax Law, as amended by chapter 56 of the Laws of 2010, part
Y. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 20
§§
8201-3.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
